title: 3Angle Watch Face
summary: A minimalistic sci-fi triangle smoothly changing its shape to tell the time
description: The concept is about connecting the dots that each pointer is pointing, placing a minimalist sci-fi trignale constantly and smoothly changing its shape to the time. You might be the only one to decipher it but it's a cool and personal way to it."3ANGLE Smartwatch, presents the time in a perplexing other-worldly figure." -Yanko Designhttp://www.yankodesign.com/2015/07/02/tri-to-tell-the-time/"With ‘3angle’ the interface shapes the aesthetics of the watch, and offers a unique software experience for the user." -Design Boomhttp://www.designboom.com/technology/3angle-watch-face-rasam-rostami-07-10-2015/Behance page: https://goo.gl/bOsOEE
descriptionHTML:
The concept is about connecting the dots that each pointer is pointing, placing a minimalist sci-fi trignale constantly and smoothly changing its shape to the time. You might be the only one to decipher it but it's a cool and personal way to it.
"3ANGLE Smartwatch, presents the time in a perplexing other-worldly figure." -Yanko Design
http://www.yankodesign.com/2015/07/02/tri-to-tell-the-time/
"With ‘3angle’ the interface shapes the aesthetics of the watch, and offers a unique software experience for the user." -Design Boom
http://www.designboom.com/technology/3angle-watch-face-rasam-rostami-07-10-2015/

Behance page: https://goo.gl/bOsOEE
